name: Ext_R5_MedicationRequest_medication
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationRequest.medication for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationRequest.medication from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Identifies the medication being requested. This is a link to a resource that represents the medication which may be the details of the medication or simply an attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.medication` maps to R4B `MedicationRequest.medication[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A coded concept identifying substance or product that can be ordered.
